an8.10:2.5: See BB’s note on the variants.
an8.10:6.2: Kakkhala here and daddara below are onomatapoeic. Kakkhala isn’t “dull” as BB has it, but ='crack, clap, click, clang, crackle “. Daddara ='thud, thump”
an8.10:8.1: BB has “calm”, apparently reading santavaco with MS text, but I prefer sanhavaco with PTS and Hare.
an8.10:11.4: kappayavho is middle 2nd imperative pl, i.e. = -tha
